extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Relief in topographic maps and Encryption in money have Contour Lines in common
extended_metaphor.relief: Contour Lines in topographic maps create a visual representation of height and depth by spacing contour lines according to specific intervals of elevation difference.
extended_metaphor.encryption: Similarly, in Encryption in money, specific patterns and intervals are used to encode the value of currency and protect it from unauthorized access.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Relief in topographic maps and Encryption in money have Shading Techniques in common
extended_metaphor.relief: Shading Techniques in topographic maps enhance the depiction of terrain features by simulating light and shadow effects based on relative elevations.
extended_metaphor.encryption: Likewise, in Encryption in money, different shading techniques, such as encryption algorithms, are used to enhance security and protect the value of currency from unauthorized access.
